tool_description: Assigns roles to users and manages user-role relationships with support for temporary assignments and effective date controls.

user_id.description: Identifier of the user to assign roles to

role_ids.description: List of role identifiers to assign to the user

effective_date.description: When the role assignment becomes effective

error_messages: User not found: The specified user_id does not exist in the system.
Role not found: One or more role_ids are invalid or don't exist.
Invalid date range: Effective date must be before expiry date.
Role limit exceeded: Users cannot have more than 5 active roles simultaneously.
Duplicate role assignment: User already has one or more of the specified roles.
usage: Assign roles to users by providing user_id and role_ids. Set effective_date and expiry_date for time-bound assignments.

assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for this role assignment

active_roles.description: Total number of active roles for this user
